title: About Me
description: Hello and welcome to my website! My name is Berin, and I'm a multimedia creator based in Sarajevo, Bosnia and Herzegovina. With years of experience working on many different projects, I've honed my skills in video editing, graphic design, branding, and game development. Whether it's crafting compelling visual narratives through video, designing eye-catching graphics and logos, or developing immersive gaming experiences, I'm passionate about bringing ideas to life through my work.
